nodes.text: Star Wars: Return of the Jedi Manga
Star Wars: Return of the Jedi Manga is a manga adaptation of Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. It is written by Shin-Ichi Hiromoto and was published by Titan Comics on October 12, 2018.
Luke Skywalker and his friends in the Rebel Alliance formulate a daring plan to defeat the Empire and its evil leaders, Darth Vader and the Emperor.

In this final manga adaptation of the original Star Wars trilogy, Luke plots a daring mission to rescue his friend Han Solo from the clutches of gangster Jaba the Hutt. Then, the gang rejoin the rebellion to stop the evil Emperor and Darth Vader, flying to the moon of Endor in a bid to destroy the new dreaded Death Star and end the Empire once and for all!
